programme.title: Motorsport F1 Grand Prix
programme.desc: Highlights Jake Humphrey introduces highlights from the Singapore Grand Prix. World champion Sebastian Vettel has dominated the season so far, but the young German has yet to win at the Marina Bay Street Circuit.
